sentences.en: I get completely discombobulated when I work figures that big.
sentences.cn: 当我计算那么大一笔数时,我完全糊涂了.

sentences.en: If a surprise, then the establishment is discombobulated, and the cover - up more likely to crack.

sentences.en: The spokesman was completely discombobulated by the hecklers.
